name: Validates that the authors API is persisting authors
statusMessage:
Expected object:
PostAuthorRequest{id=618, idBook=1, firstName='First Name 1', lastName='Last Name 1'}
but got:
GetAuthorsResponse{id=618, idBook=200, firstName='First Name 618', lastName='Last Name 618'} expected [PostAuthorRequest{id=618, idBook=1, firstName='First Name 1', lastName='Last Name 1'}] but found [GetAuthorsResponse{id=618, idBook=200, firstName='First Name 618', lastName='Last Name 618'}]
